
{{alias}}( x, value )
    Counts the number of elements that are equal to a given value in an array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ArrayLikeObject
        Input array.

    value: any
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: integer
        Number of elements that are equal to the given value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( [ 0, 1, 1 ], 1 )
    2

    See Also
    --------
